content:
# The recipe for the stone furnace requires 5 stone. Since I currently have no stone in my inventory, I will need to gather some before I can craft the furnace.
# 
# I will now look for a nearby stone resource to harvest the necessary stone.

# Let's find the nearest stone resource location.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)
print(f'Stone Position: {stone_position}')  # Displaying the position of the nearest stone resource.
